== Kottathara (627612) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kottathara is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 7220 hectares and harbouring 2790 households with total population of 10195 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Coimbatore]] is at a distance of 46 km. Male population is 5072 and female population is 5123. Scheduled Caste Population is 450 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4919. Census Location Code of the village is 627612<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 6549 (64.24%)
* Literate male population: 3505 (69.1%)
* Literate female population: 3044 (59.42%)
